page.title: 19Tehidy Woods.
page.content: Part of{Tehidy Woods}is being developed into a{Country Park.}For two years the 12 people who are employed at the{woods}have been making it safe by building new{stiles}and {fences}and rebuilding old ones which are in poor condition.Another thing that is happening is they are draining the lake so the water will flow easily and it will stay clean.The only plan for the{lake}is to stock it with{fish so water{birds}will nest there.Old {trees}have been cut down and many new ones have been planted.At the moment only a few people visit the{woods}now and again.The{Country Park}will be open to the public some time in 1990.It will be open seven days a week and there will be no admission fee. People will be able to ride{horses}and take their pet{dogs}into the{Country {Park.
